name: 15Five, Inc.
description: Operator of a performance management platform intended to create effective managers, highly engaged employees and high-powered organizations. The company's platform offers a research-backed performance tracker focused on forwarding growth and performance for each individual, enabling clients to monitor their employee's performance via mobile applications effectively.
